short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Edit your favourite photos & images. Draw; use filters, shapes and cool stickers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Editing your favourite photos is now easier than ever before. MM Photo Editor has tons of image editing features.

- Quickly crop, resize and rotate images
- More than 600 fonts to choose from
- Change text size, colour, opacity, background and outline
- Freely draw anything you want with drawing tool
- Enhance beauty of your images by applying photo filters
- Wanna integrate a shape? Yes, we have it.
- Who doesn't love stickers? We have a lot more for you.
- Layered approach to photo editing
- See history of every change made
